title: My Pixel 6 Pro’s display died – Here’s how Google’s recommended walk-in repair went
content:
“Are you breaking stuff over there?” my wife said, seconds after my phone hit the ground. Sadly, though, I was. My Pixel 6 Pro’s display was dead and, for the first time in years, it was time to figure out the cost and time it would take to repair my daily driver. Here’s how that went.

more…

The post My Pixel 6 Pro’s display died – Here’s how Google’s recommended walk-in repair went appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: I recently broke the display on my Pixel 6 Pro, and the repair experience showed me how Google has improved things, and what it all costs.
